channel.title: Outreach on Sam Passmore

item.title: Cultured Scene
item.description: I wrote a piece for the December issue of Cultured Scene! It is a short(ish) piece on why kinship is interesting, why we need to take a quantitative approach to studying it, and what I have done so far in my PhD. Check it out here
